1.name: Soldier (卒) or (兵)
1.description: The Soldier is simliar to the Pawn in Chess
movement: Before crossing the river, can move forward one space
After crossing the river, can move forward or to either side one space

3.name: Cannon (砲) or (炮)
3.description: The Cannon is simliar to a Rook in Chess but has the ability to jump pieces
movement: Can move any distance orthogonally without attacking or jumping
Can capture a piece on its movement path if jumping over another piece, called a "screen"
Can only jump over exactly one piece
The "screen" piece can be either a friend or opponent piece

5.name: Chariot (車) or (俥)
5.description: The Chariot almost identical to the Rook in Chess

7.name: Horse (馬) or (傌)
7.description: The Horse is simliar to the Knight in Chess but is more restricted in movement
movement: Moves orthogonally one space in any direction and then diagonally one space away from its original position
Cannot jump over pieces and can be blocked in the orthogonal direction

9.name: Elephant (象) or Minister (相)
9.description: The Elephant is simliar to the Bishop in Chess but is much more restricted in movement
movement: Moves diagonally in any direction exactly two spaces
Cannot cross the river onto opponent's side

11.name: Advisor (士) or (仕)
11.description: The Advisor has no equivalent in Chess and is used to protect the King
movement: Moves diagonally one space in any direction within the 3x3 general's palace
Possible movement is marked on the board by diaganol lines

13.name: General (將) or Minister (帅)
13.description: The General is simliar to the King in Chess but is more restricted in movement
movement: Moves orthogonoally one space within the 3x3 general's palace
Can attack the opponent's general if they are the same column and no pieces block the path
